title: Not Too Proud
description:
Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon talk the NHL pausing their season, react to Monday Night Football including a tough game for Wilbon's Bears and preview Tuesday Night Football for tonight.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
